reference.title: rint, rintf, remainder, remainderf : round and remainder

section.title: Synopsis
Description
section.p: rint and rintf returns their argument rounded to the nearest integer. remainder and remainderf find the remainder of x/y; this value is in the range -y/2 .. +y/2.

section.title: Returns
section.p: rint and remainder return the integer result as a double.
